idea-plugin.name: Jimmer-Generator
idea-plugin.description:
English:

  • Generate entity class interfaces for the Jimmer framework, supporting Java, Kotlin
  • Automatically generate a parent interface for each entity class interface, you can store the association relationship in the parent interface
  • Based on the Database Tool plug-in, it theoretically supports most databases, and currently validates PostgreSQL, MySQL

中文：

  • 为Jimmer框架生成实体类接口，支持Java、Kotlin
  • 自动为每一个实体类接口生成一个父类接口，可以在父类接口中存放关联关系
  • 基于Database Tool插件开发，理论上支持大部分数据库，目前已验证PostgreSQL、MySQL
idea-plugin.change-notes:
1.1.0

  • Minimum supported version adjusted to 2020.3.4
  • Annotation adjustment of the primary key field in the generated interface classes(GeneratedValue -> GeneratedValue(strategy = GenerationType.IDENTITY))
  • bug fixes
    • In kotlin projects, the generated entity class interfaces will appear in the ksp folder
    • Possible errors when an option is cancelled in the middle
  • 最低支持的版本调整为2020.3.4
  • 生成的接口类中，主键字段的注解调整(GeneratedValue -> GeneratedValue(strategy = GenerationType.IDENTITY))
